The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Accompanying this letter you will find a booklet (please click here to download) containing detailed information about upcoming residential trips for the current and next academic years.
If you intend for you child to attend the residential trip for their year group in June of 2012, we will require a 50% deposit no later than 31st January 2012.
Please complete the form (please click here to download) to indicate if your child will or will not be attending one of the residential trips for this academic year.
Yours faithfully,
Michelle Hamilton
Secondary Phase Leader
The International School of Moscow
